parameters.name: DrdsInstanceId
parameters.description: The ID of the PolarDB-X 1.0 instance.

parameters.name: RegionId
parameters.description: The ID of the region where the PolarDB-X 1.0 instance is created.

parameters.name: SourceTableName
parameters.description: The name of the table or table shard on which you want to perform the task.

parameters.name: TargetTableName
parameters.description: The name of the table or table shard on which you perform the task.

parameters.name: TaskType
parameters.description:
The type of the task. Valid values:

*   **SINGLE_TO_SHARD**: converts a single table to a table shard.
*   **SHARD_TO_SINGLE**: converts a table shard to a single table.
*   **SHARD_TO_SHARD**: converts a table shard to another table shard.
